Rule.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_DXC
Rule.Description: Options for the Microsoft.Direct3D.DXC NuGet Package

StringProperty.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_DXC_CopyLocation
StringProperty.Description: Specify exe-relative path to modify the copy destination for dxcompiler.dll etc.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_DXC_SkipLibraryCopy
BoolProperty.Description: Disables copying dxcompiler.dll and dxcompiler.pdb into the project output directory.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_Direct3D_DXC_SkipIncludeDir
BoolProperty.Description: Disables appending the package's include folder as an additional include directory.
